text: Bavarians (Standard German and Bavarian: Bayern) are an ethnographic group of Germans of Bavaria. The group's dialect is Bavarian and German. == List of popular Bavarians == === Scientists === * Joseph von Fraunhofer (1787–1826) * Feodor Lynen (1911–1979) === Politicians === * Ludwig II of Bavaria (1845–1886) * Heinrich Luitpold Himmler (1900–1945) * Franz Josef Strauß (1915–1988) * Roman Herzog (1934–2017) * Edmund Stoiber (1941–) * Horst Seehofer (1949–) === Artists === * Christoph Willibald Gluck (1714–1787) * Richard Strauss (1864–1949) * Franz Marc (1880–1916) * Michael Ende (1929–1995) * Werner Herzog (1942–) === Sportspeople === * Franz Beckenbauer (1945–2024) * Philipp Lahm (1983–) * Magdalena Neuner (1987–) * Thomas Müller (1989–) === Others === * Traudl Junge (1920–2002) * Joseph Ratzinger (1927–) Category:Ethnic groups in Europe
title: Bavarians
